definition: temporary law/provisional constitution
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to agree on three laws (idiom)/three-point covenant/(fig.) preliminary agreement/basic rules

sentences.english: You can do this by making rules with your friends that you will only speak English.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和你的朋友約法三章，你們只許講英語。

sentences.english: You can do this by rules with your friends that you will only speak English.
sentences.chinese: 你可以和你的朋友約法三章，你們只許講英語。

sentences.english: I set some ground rules, trying to be clear and reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 我跟她約法三章，儘量清晰合理。

sentences.english: Misrepresentation is different from warranty in the contract law.
sentences.chinese: 虛假陳述侵權與契約法上的擔保制度不同。

sentences.english: Since I don't have the time to properly train you, I'm laying down three simple rules.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我沒有時間去訓練你們，所以我在這約法三章。

sentences.english: The theory of efficient breach is very important in the economic analysis of contract law.
sentences.chinese: 效率違約理論是契約法經濟分析的重要方面。

sentences.english: Strict liability derives from Roman law as the contract responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格責任最初作爲契約法上的責任源於羅馬法。

sentences.english: Marriage that night, cheng bite gold to draw up three chapters.
sentences.chinese: 婚事當晚，程咬金欲約法三章。

sentences.english: The diagnosis rules are obtained by combination and reduction.
sentences.chinese: 採用合併歸約法獲取了故障診斷規則。

sentences.english: Freedom of contract is the core and essence of modern contract law.
sentences.chinese: 契約自由原則是近代契約法的核心和精髓。

sentences.english: Lily, Ted is our best friend, let's get something straight.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉，特德是我們最好的朋友，我們先約法三章。

sentences.english: We hereby proclaim the following eight-point covenant by which we, together with the whole people, shall abide.
sentences.chinese: 茲特宣佈約法八章，願與我全體人民共同遵守之。

sentences.english: This is another step downwards in the history of contract-law.
sentences.chinese: 這是契約法歷史中向前推進的另一步。

sentences.english: The above questions involve a series of treaty law issues.
sentences.chinese: 這些矛盾涉及一系列的國際法中的條約法問題。

sentences.english: Freedom of contract is fundamental spirit of modern contract law.
sentences.chinese: 契約自由是現代契約法的基本精神。

definition: principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
